data.title:
I want you to act as a senior full-stack developer, edtech strategist, UI/UX designer, cloud deployment expert, and web security analyst.

I am building a high-quality online + offline coaching institute website named ‚ÄúJDSR Academy‚Äù, directed by Monika Singh, focused on preparing students for government jobs in Uttar Pradesh and Uttarakhand, including but not limited to:

üèõÔ∏è Targeted Exams & Courses:

UPSC (Pre + Mains + Interview)

UKPSC, UKPCS, RO/ARO, VDO, Patwari, Lekhpal

UPPSC, UPPCS, RO/ARO, BEO, LT Grade

SSC (CGL, CHSL, MTS)

Railway (RRB NTPC, Group D, ALP)

Defence (NDA, CDS, Agniveer)

Police Exams (UP Police, UK Police, SI/Constable)

Teaching (UPTET, CTET, Super TET)

Group C, Group D, Gram Panchayat Adhikari, etc.

üß© Objective:

The website should be a high-converting LMS with modern UI/UX and must support:

Online live + recorded courses

Offline classroom batches

Test series

Certificate generation

Payment handling

Student dashboard

Admin panel

Highly secure & scalable backend

üî• What I want from you:

Give me a complete development plan, including:

All necessary modules & features (frontend + backend)

Suggested UI/UX tools and animation libraries

Scalable tech stack (frontend, backend, DB, CDN, payment)

Full security checklist

Smart video protection strategy

SEO optimized structure for Google ranking

Suggested folder structure, database schema, and API endpoints

Best tools for email + push notification + WhatsApp integration

Suggestions for a PWA or Android app (if applicable)

Legal compliance: refund policy, privacy, data handling

üß† Key Features Required (A to Z):

Hero section with CTA, Monika Singh intro, exam highlights

Course listing & filtering (by exam, category, state)

Course detail page with syllabus, fee, ratings, demo video

Razorpay/UPI/Stripe payment integration

Student dashboard (my courses, notes, progress, tests)

Test series module with auto evaluation

PDF/Note download section

Ask doubt/discussion system

Admin panel to manage everything

Certificate generation (with verification)

Notifications (email + push + WhatsApp)

Testimonials (written + video)

Legal pages (privacy, refund, terms)

Contact form + Google Map + WhatsApp API

üé® UI/UX & Animation Frameworks (must be used):

TailwindCSS + Shadcn/UI for component styling

Framer Motion for clean animations

GSAP for scroll-based effects

LottieFiles for onboarding animations

AOS (Animate On Scroll)

Figma for design mockups

üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack You Should Recommend:

Area

Tools/Tech Suggestion

Frontend

React.js / Next.js + TailwindCSS

Backend

Node.js + Express OR Django

Database

MongoDB (NoSQL) or PostgreSQL (RDBMS)

Auth

Firebase Auth / JWT

Payments

Razorpay, Stripe, Paytm

Video Hosting

Vimeo / AWS S3 with DRM / HLS Encryption

Storage

AWS S3 or Firebase Storage

Hosting

Vercel / Netlify (frontend), Render / AWS EC2 (backend)

CDN

Cloudflare (SSL + performance + caching)

Analytics

Google Analytics, Hotjar, Facebook Pixel

üîê Security You Must Implement:

JWT Auth with refresh token support

Role-based access (Admin/Student/Staff)

Video protection with token-based signed URLs

Anti-XSS, CSRF, SQL Injection protections

HTTPS everywhere (Cloudflare SSL)

Rate limiting, brute force prevention

CAPTCHA (login, signup)

Webhook signature verification (Razorpay)

Encrypted backups

üì¶ Bonus Features (Optional but Valuable):

Course bundles & discount coupons

WhatsApp chatbot assistant

Student leaderboard

AI quiz generator (future)

Certificate verification portal (by serial ID)

Referral program

üóÇÔ∏è Deliverables I Expect:

Folder structure

Database schema

UI mockups (Figma or others)

Complete list of APIs with methods

Hosting suggestions

SEO checklist

Deployment + version control plan

Please think and plan like a professional agency building a real-world scalable coaching business LMS, and return a complete blueprint.

Do not miss any module or optimization.Give me everything from developer + UI/UX + marketing + security + user experience point of view.Make sure it‚Äôs ready to attract students from across UP and Uttarakhand and compete with top coaching platforms.

analysis these all criterias and think deep before and You are a senior full-stack developer, UI/UX expert, cloud architect, and security analyst.Your task is to immediately start creating the full-stack source code and architecture for a real coaching institute website named "JDSR Academy", directed by Monika Singh, focused on government job preparation for Uttar Pradesh and Uttarakhand (UPSC, UKPSC, UPPSC, SSC, Police, Teaching, Railway, etc.).

Do not explain ‚Äî just build.

I want you to start creating:

üîπ 1. Full Project Folder Structure

For a modern MERN stack or Django + React-based project

üîπ 2. Frontend Code (React/Next.js)

Homepage with hero section, course highlights, CTA

Course listing and course detail pages

Student dashboard (My Courses, Notes, Tests, Progress)

Test Series page

Payment integration (Razorpay UI)

Contact form with WhatsApp

Mobile responsive + Tailwind CSS + Framer Motion animations

Routing with protected pages (for logged-in users)

üîπ 3. Backend Code (Node.js + Express OR Django)

Auth (JWT + role-based control)

Course management CRUD (create/edit/delete)

User profiles

Admin controls

Quiz and test APIs

Certificate generation API

Razorpay webhook handling

Email/Push notification logic

RESTful API design (with documentation)

üîπ 4. MongoDB or PostgreSQL Schema Design

User (student, admin, teacher)

Course

Video Content

Test/Quiz Results

Orders/Payments

Certificate

Notifications

üîπ 5. Security & Deployment Configurations

HTTPS via Cloudflare

CORS config, Helmet, Rate limiting

Captcha integration

Backend validation + logging

Production-ready .env configs

Hosting (frontend: Vercel, backend: Render or AWS EC2)

üîπ 6. Demo Sample Content

One sample course

One student account

One test

One certificate template

üîπ 7. Build & Show

After creating full code, give:

GitHub repository structure

Demo preview URLs (e.g. via Vercel + Render)

Figma link or mockup snapshot

Setup instructions (for developers)

üß† Rules:

Do not leave any section incomplete.

Use latest and secure practices.

Make all parts production-ready.

Your job is not to plan ‚Äî your job is to build the entire working full-stack site for JDSR Academy.

I'll create a complete full-stack coaching institute website for JDSR Academy. Let me start by building the entire project structure and implementation.

input.explanation: Creating the main README file for the JDSR Academy project
input.fileText:
# JDSR Academy - Government Job Preparation Platform

## Overview
Complete LMS platform for government job preparation in UP & Uttarakhand, directed by Monika Singh.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, TailwindCSS, Shadcn/UI, Framer Motion
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, MongoDB
- **Auth**: JWT with refresh tokens
- **Payments**: Razorpay
- **Storage**: AWS S3
- **Hosting**: Vercel (frontend), Render (backend)

## Quick Start
```bash
# Frontend
cd frontend
npm install
npm run dev

# Backend
cd backend
npm install
npm start
```

## Features
- Online/Offline course management
- Live & recorded video streaming
- Test series with auto-evaluation
- Student dashboard & progress tracking
- Admin panel
- Certificate generation
- Payment integration
- WhatsApp notifications

## Security
- JWT authentication
- Role-based access control
- Video DRM protection
- Rate limiting
- HTTPS everywhere

messages.body: Now let me create the backend structure:

input.fileText:
{
  "name": "jdsr-academy-backend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Backend API for JDSR Academy LMS",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "dev": "nodemon server.js",
    "test": "jest",
    "seed": "node scripts/seed.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.18.2",
    "mongoose": "^8.0.3",
    "bcryptjs": "^2.4.3",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    "express-rate-limit": "^7.1.5",
    "express-validator": "^7.0.1",
    "multer": "^1.4.5-lts.1",
    "aws-sdk": "^2.1509.0",
    "nodemailer": "^6.9.7",
    "razorpay": "^2.9.2",
    "crypto": "^1.0.1",
    "dotenv": "^16.3.1",
    "morgan": "^1.10.0",
    "compression": "^1.7.4",
    "express-mongo-sanitize": "^2.2.0",
    "xss-clean": "^0.1.4",
    "hpp": "^0.2.3",
    "cookie-parser": "^1.4.6",
    "pdf-lib": "^1.17.1",
    "canvas": "^2.11.2",
    "node-cron": "^3.0.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "nodemon": "^3.0.2",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "supertest": "^6.3.3"
  },
  "keywords": ["education", "lms", "api", "coaching"],
  "author": "JDSR Academy",
  "license": "MIT"
}

input.explanation: Creating main server.js file with security and middleware setup

input.fileText:
# Database
MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/jdsr-academy

# JWT
JWT_SECRET=your-super-secret-jwt-key-here
JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=your-refresh-token-secret-here
JWT_EXPIRE=7d
JWT_REFRESH_EXPIRE=30d

# Server
NODE_ENV=development
PORT=5000

# AWS S3
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=your-aws-access-key
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=your-aws-secret-key
AWS_REGION=ap-south-1
AWS_S3_BUCKET=jdsr-academy-bucket

# Razorpay
RAZORPAY_KEY_ID=your-razorpay-key-id
RAZORPAY_KEY_SECRET=your-razorpay-key-secret
RAZORPAY_WEBHOOK_SECRET=your-webhook-secret

# Email (Nodemailer)
EMAIL_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
EMAIL_PORT=587
EMAIL_USER=your-email@gmail.com
EMAIL_PASS=your-app-password

# WhatsApp API
WHATSAPP_API_URL=https://api.whatsapp.com
WHATSAPP_TOKEN=your-whatsapp-token

# Frontend URL
FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000

# Admin
ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@jdsracademy.com
ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123456

Creating utility functions for the frontend
Creating authentication context with token management
